name: Blind Almost-Pong
description:
[Instructions are on-screen, because there is nothing else to put there ^_^]
You may need to click on the game screen once to focus keyboard input on it and hear sounds.

Made for: https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-123
Theme: Same but different.

SOURCE CODE (MIT): https://notabug.org/Houkime/blind-almost-pong

Third party stuff:

Sine wave generator for Godot (because Godot doesn't have a builtin one):
https://github.com/godotengine/godot-demo-projects/tree/master/audio/generator.git

Font Glacial Indifference (OFL): https://fontlibrary.org/en/font/glacial-indifference
OFL license text: http://scripts.sil.org/cms/scripts/page.php?site_id=nrsi&id=OFL_web
